Title: Building Rock-Solid Avalonia Apps A Guide to Headless Testing with AI Assistance
Author: dotnet
Description:
Application quality is non-negotiable, but UI testing can be a bottleneck. Let's fix that! This session is your guide to implementing a professional testing strategy for Avalonia application. We'll dive deep into headless testing, the technique that allows you to execute complex UI interaction tests at incredible speed, without a display server.

To take it to the next level, we'll incorporate GitHub Copilot. We'll show live examples of how GitHub Copilot acts as your AI pair programmer, helping you write tests faster, overcome stumping challenges, and maintain your test suite with ease.

Session: Building Rock-Solid Avalonia Apps A Guide to Headless Testing with AI Assistance

Watch more .NET Conf 2025 videos at https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLdo4fOcmZ0oXtIlvq1tuORUtZqVG-HdCt
